name: Unity-chan Card Combat (UCCC)
description:
A rogue-lite deck-building card battle game with Unity-chan!

Unity-chan is invited to a strange world to fight against enemies.

Survive the waves of enemies by utilizing powerful cards.

Features

- Turn-based combat with various cards

- Card pack shop to get new cards

- Permanent character power-ups

See the playing manual for detail.

https://yorkieandschnauzer.github.io/uccc/en/index.html

Currently this game is only available in English.

This game is developed with Nue Deck by Arefnue.

https://arefnue.itch.io/nue-deck
